00032 #include "AISMerge.h"
00033 #include "AISExceptions.h"
00034 #include "Response.h"
00035 
00048 Response *
00049 AISMerge::get_ais_resource(const string &res) throw(Error, InternalErr)
00050 {
00051     if (res.find("http:") == 0
00052     || res.find("file:") == 0 
00053     || res.find("https:") == 0 ) {
00054     return d_http.fetch_url(res);
00055     }
00056     else {
00057     FILE *s = fopen(res.c_str(), "r");
00058     if (!s)
00059         throw Error("I could not open local AIS resource '"
00060             + res + "'.");
00061     return new Response(s);
00062     }
00063 }
00064 
00078 void
00079 AISMerge::merge(const string &primary, DAS &das) throw(Error, InternalErr)
00080 {
00081     if (!d_ais_db.has_resource(primary))
00082     return;
00083 
00084     try {
00085     ResourceVector rv = d_ais_db.get_resource(primary);
00086     
00087     for (ResourceVectorIter i = rv.begin(); i != rv.end(); ++i) {
00088         Response *ais_resource = get_ais_resource(i->get_url());
00089         switch (i->get_rule()) {
00090           case Resource::overwrite:
00091         das.parse(ais_resource->get_stream());
00092         break;
00093           case Resource::replace:
00094         das.erase();
00095         das.parse(ais_resource->get_stream());
00096         break;
00097           case Resource::fallback:
00098         if (das.get_size() == 0)
00099             das.parse(ais_resource->get_stream());
00100         break;
00101         }
00102         delete ais_resource;
00103     }
00104     }
00105     catch (NoSuchPrimaryResource &e) {
00106     throw InternalErr(string("I caught a 'NoSuchPrimaryResource' exception, it said:\n") + e.get_error_message() + string("\n"));
00107     }
00108 }
